issue.title: [Python] Implement __getitem__ / slicing on Buffer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2664](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2664). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Subscripting `pyarrow.Buffer` instances currently raises, we should implement it in a similar fashion as `pyarrow.Array.__getitem__`.
